import React from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import UrlBackEnd from "../../../models/UrlBackEnd"; import UrlFrontEnd from "../../../models/UrlFrontEnd"; class Messages extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(); this.state = { errorMessage: '', token: props.token, messagesList: null } this.getMessages = this.getMessages.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { let url = UrlBackEnd + 'messages/' + this.state.token + '/' axios.post(url, {}) .then(response => { let data = response.data; const messagesList = data.map((content) => (
{content.destinator.name}

{ content.content}

{content.date.slice(11,16)} {content.date.slice(0,5)}
{content.date.slice(0,10)}
)) this.setState({ messagesList : messagesList }) }) .catch(error => { alert(error.toString()) }); } getMessages = (page) => { this.setState({ page: page }) } render() { const page =
{ this.state.messagesList }
